name: Car Steering
description: In most cars, small trucks and SUVs on the road today, there is a rack and pinion steering system. This converts the rotational motion of the steering wheel into the linear motion that turns the wheels and guides your path.

name: Disk Break
description: A disc brake is a type of brake that uses the calipers to squeeze pairs of pads against a disc or a rotor to create friction. This action slows the rotation of a shaft, such as a vehicle axle, either to reduce its rotational speed.

name: Wheel
description: The car wheel parts perform different roles to ensure that it functions as expected. Some of car wheel parts have been subjects of misunderstanding and confusion. Below we breakdown these parts and understand their structure, functions, and adaptations.

name: Wheel Frame
description: The rim is a cylindrical wheel outer edge holding the tire on the wheel. Main function of the rim is supporting and sealing the tire to the wheel. The rim ensures proper fitting between tire and rim and retaining the air inside the tubeless tire.

name: Piston
description: The piston is an essential part of the internal combustion engine which is key in converting the fuel which you use to fill up your car into energy to drive the car forward. It is a moving component which is used to transfer the force.

name: Side Mirror
description: A side-view mirror, also known as a wing mirror, is a mirror placed on the exterior of motor vehicles for the purposes of helping the driver see areas behind and to the sides of the vehicle, outside the driver's peripheral vision.

name: Display
description: Having a premium car display screen installed in your car is a must to keep you entertained during your journey and also to help in the proper navigation of your car. Watch full HD videos using a USB pen drive or memory card, on the car display screen
